block.p: Suzanne Lesser, a daughter of Ruth Lesser and Dr. Robert Lesser of Woodbridge, Conn., is to be married today at her parents' house to Anthony Phillips, a son of Marion Phillips and Dr. Eduardo Phillips of Bloomfield Hills, Mich. Rabbi Richard Eisenberg is to officiate.

The bride, 28, is the education coordinator at the Museum of Television and Radio in Manhattan. Until June, she taught kindergarten at the Town School in Manhattan. She graduated cum laude from Brandeis University and received a master's degree in museum education from the Bank Street College of Education. Her father is a neuro-ophthalmalogist in New Haven and Waterbury, Conn. He is also a clinical professor of ophthalmology at Yale in New Haven and a clinical professor of neurology and neurosurgery at the University of Connecticut School of Medicine in Farmington. Her mother is an adjunct assistant Spanish professor at Quinnipiac University in Hamden, Conn.

She graduated cum laude from Brandeis University and received a master's degree in museum education from the Bank Street College of Education. Her father is a neuro-ophthalmalogist in New Haven and Waterbury, Conn. He is also a clinical professor of ophthalmology at Yale in New Haven and a clinical professor of neurology and neurosurgery at the University of Connecticut School of Medicine in Farmington. Her mother is an adjunct assistant Spanish professor at Quinnipiac University in Hamden, Conn.

The bridegroom, 28, produces Web sites at Standpipe Studios, a software and Web development company in Brooklyn. He graduated from the University of Michigan. His mother is the founder of Images and Imagination, an art instruction program for children in Bloomfield Hills. She is also a docent at the Detroit Institute of Art. His father is a general surgeon in Farmington Hills, Mich., a chief of surgery at the Detroit Medical Center and an associate professor of surgery at Wayne State School of Medicine in Detroit.

WEDDINGS Correction: September 10, 2000, Sunday A report last Sunday about the wedding of Suzanne Lesser and Anthony Phillips included an outdated reference to the site of the ceremony. It took place at the New Haven Lawn Club. It was moved from the home of the bride's parents in Woodbridge, Conn., because of bad weather.
